name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (elijahgardner)
description:
Crystal Caverns is a retro style arcade platformer strategy game. 

Your objective is to navigate the Crystal Miner around in the caves collecting crystals. Be careful the paths are patrolled by fire breathing dragons. You can avoid the dragons by climbing the ladders. The dragons will sense you as soon as you are in their tunnel and start chasing you down. 

Once all the crystals are collected you will warp to the next cavern to continue your crystal collecting adventures.

Enjoy!
